name: Agents: Mainframe Madness
description: The Agents need your help. Click or touch any of the walls in the levels to place a turret. The turrets will shoot at the closest Hacker Bot to prevent it from destroying the Agents' computer mainframe. But watch out! If the bots hit the mainframe, you'll lose a turret! If the bots completely destroy the mainframe, you'll fail the mission. Good luck.
